column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////One of the musts when in Chicago is to have a traditional deep dish pizza. We asked around to everyone we met and they all recommended Lou Malnati's Pizzeria for real deep dish. We weren't disappointed
column2: we ordered the "Malnati Chicago Classic" and it was simply delicious and I couldn't get enough of it. A must when you're visiting Chicago... My gut thanks god I don't live near one.
